In a  loss to Nevada Saturday night senior quarterback
Bryant Moniz suffered an ankle injury and is expected
to be out for the season PERIOD

In  games so far this season Moniz racked up  passing
touchdowns averaging . yards per game PERIOD The Wahiaw native was
selected as the WAC preseason player of the year after finishing
last season on the allWAC second team PERIOD

Senior quarterback Shane Austin filled in for Moniz against the
Wolf Pack and threw for  yards and one touchdown PERIOD
